::Perndbot::

"Allright," Perndabot replies, looking around and thinking over where 
to land. There was a mountain nearby where he could land and keep 
track of everything going on, but that would make him a pretty easy 
target in case Darkfate didn't want to negotiate a treaty.

He spots a clearing, swooping down and landing. Perfect. He could see 
for a good distance, enough to prepare for an attack, and there was 
practically no interference to his scanners.

"I'm all settled in," he replies to Darkfate, "Ready when you are."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:

>
